articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Trump wants EU to buy more US oil and gas or face tariffs - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said on Friday the European Union should step up U.S. oil and gas imports or face tariffs on the bloc's exports that include goods such as cars and machinery.
articles.content: Dec 20 (Reuters) - U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said on Friday the European Union should step up U.S. oil and gas imports or face tariffs on the bloc's exports that include goods such as cars an… [+5115 chars]
